projectName: Madison Square Garden Sphere Entertainment Co.

longDescription: I was a software engineer on the Simulation and Visualizations (SimVis) team, a team developing software products used internally for content production at Sphere as well as other Madison Square Garden properties. As a Software Engineering Student Associate for SimVis, I...
resumeBullets: Worked on a multiuser Virtual Reality and Desktop application used by creatives at the Sphere for simulataneous media playback and reviewing.
Implemented moveable user interface panels in 2D and 3D space, optimizing user experience and productivity.
Communicated closely with the engineering team to design architecture solution, create detailed technical specification for, and prototype moveable panels using Agile methodologies.

Tackled and resolved a critical bug in the in-built debug panel used by developers when debugging and testing builds and further developed the feature so that logs can be cleared and saved across all platforms.
